content: **easy easter bunny worry worm crochet pattern** i just love crochet worry worms and i try to make one for every occasion now that easter is around the corner i thought of making some bunny worry worms to leave out and about for people to find i wanted the simplest possible pattern that can be crocheted quickly and easily because i m going to be making a lot of these if you re new to the idea of worry worms you can have a look at this post 1 where i explain why worry worms are so special https //startcrochet com/worry-worms-story-pattern-poems/ these little crocheted bunnies are great to add to kids easter baskets give to kids at school or church kids love to hold them and keep them in their pockets they are meant to help kids with anxiety and worries you can read more about this on the blog post if you d like to add some ** pre-designed tags 2 ** to your crocheted bunnies you may purchase them from my blog here 3 sold separately they are a **pdf printable** and you have the option to edit the design or poem with a free canva account https //startcrochet com/product/easter-bunny-worry-worm-poem-tags-editable-with-canva/ **new themed worry worms crochet patterns + poem tags bundle sale ** 4 *i designed some more themed worry worms 5 that you could use throughout the year for different seasons/occasions have a look at these new worry worm designs as well in the link above * **materials needed** - some dk cotton yarn in colors of choice i used ricorumi dk 100% cotton in white pink and blue - crochet hook that fits your yarn for this project i used a 3 5 mm hook - a tapestry needle - a pair of scissors - goggly eyes a pair of black beads small black buttons or stick-on eyes please see suggested optional alternatives for child-friendly eyes - printer & a4 paper or card stock to print your poem tags optional **abbreviations** mc = magic_ring chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch fo = fasten_off **skill level** advanced beginner - knowledge of how to crochet a magic_ring or alternative - please see options in instructions below **measurements/size** this bunny measures 5 1 13 cm tall including the ears & 1 18 3 cm wide **yardage** approx 7 meters 7 6 yards **notes** numbers at the end of each step in brackets indicate the number of final stitches in that step beginning chain 2 counts as a double_crochet st there is no stitching required in this pattern except for weaving in the ends do not cut your yarn between the different sections of the bunny simply continue to the next body part if you have any questions please send me an email at admin@startcrochet com **please note** this product is for a crochet pattern only this is not a finished physical item nothing will be shipped to you by post you
